name: mathformer-calc
description: A premium calculator powered by MathFormer neural network

scripts.dist:python: cd python && uv run --isolated --no-project --with pyinstaller pyinstaller --noconfirm --onefile --console --clean --name server --exclude-module mathformer --exclude-module torch --exclude-module matplotlib --exclude-module notebook --exclude-module scipy --exclude-module tkinter server.py
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run dist:python && electron-builder build --publish never
